q: ( AFP)- Cuban dissident Guillermo Farinas, the 2010 Sakharov rights prize winner, has been arrested and police are holding him in the central city of Santa Clara, his mother and dissidents said. I spoke with him, and he told me that he is under arrest in the third police unit in Santa Clara, and then he hung up, his mother Alicia Hernandez said by phone from the city located some 240 kilometers( 150 miles) east of Havana.
